attributes.action: Legalise and regulate the use of privately owned eScooters before Spring 2021.
attributes.additional_details:
Electric scooters provide commuters with an environmentally friendly, solo, non contact travel option which can get Britain moving and back to work.

With the influx of empty cycle lanes across cities throughout the UK, the infrastructure is already in place to give the go ahead without any further delay. We believe the trials currently taking place are not a true representation of how privately owned eScooters would be used and offer nothing more than a revenue stream for large companies to capitalise on.
attributes.background:
We are representing the UK public who are calling for the legalisation and regulation around the use of privately owned eScooters to be implemented before Spring 2021

eScooters provide commuters with an environmentally friendly, solo, non contact travel option which can get Britain moving
